original_title: Probe launched over mysterious death of female lawyer in Pelmadulla
original_body_lines: The Pelmadulla Police has launched an investigation after the body of a female lawyer who died mysteriously was found in a house in Bulathwelgoda, Pelmadulla today.
Police said the body of 40-year-old Dushmanthi Abeyratne, was found lying on her bed.
The maid who came home in the morning saw the body and informed the police.
It was reported that the lawyer's husband was not at home since the 30th night.
The lawyer's family has informed the Pelmadulla police that the death is suspicious.
